starvationevasion.client.GUIOrig.DraftLayout.ProductBar

Class ProductBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.GUIOrig.DraftLayout.ProductBar.ProductBar

  • public class ProductBar
extends java.lang.Object
    ProductBar is the GUIOrig element responsible for displaying the Food Product Icons on the bottom of the GUIOrig When a user selects a product icon, it should be highlighted. A user should only be able to select one product at a time, or none at all.
